title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 52 - Payment Of Tax; Rebates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 52 - Payment Of Tax; Rebates

State Regulations
§ 52.1 - Payment of tax by use of stamps
§ 52.2 - Payment of tax by brokers through clearing corporation
§ 52.3 - Optional method of payment by dealers in securities who are not members of a securities exchange
§ 52.4 - Payment of tax by dealers through authorized corporation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 52

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
